item.title: Fb Distributed Data Store Tao
item.description: intro read-optimized social graph memcache and look-aside The distinction between look-aside and look-through caches is not whether data is fetched from the cache and memory in serial or in parallel. The distinction is whether the fetch to memory on a cache miss originates from the caller or the cache. If the fetch to memory originates from the caller on cache miss, then youâ€™re using a look-aside cache.
